list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in the Christian Church) the religious rite of sprinkling water onto a person's forehead or of immersion in water, symbolizing purification or regeneration and admission to the Christian Church. In many denominations, baptism is performed on young children and is accompanied by name-giving.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bí tích rửa tội rửa tội
